inventory=[{"type": "brown_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 18}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "lever", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 21, "index": 39}, {"type": "cod_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a brown banner I need 6 brown wool, 1 stick, and 1 brown terracotta. I will start by moving the brown wool from slot 16 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
